website_summaries.verdict: Best option for those without a lot of countertop space.
pros: Large enough tube for apples and carrots
One-touch operation makes it ideal for beginners
cons: Doesn't work great for leafy greens like spinach and kale

customer_reviews.title: Good size, easy to clean and it doesn't need to much space  (because of the size)
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The juicer is perfect to me, easy to assemble, the mouth is big so I don't have to cut the fruits and veggies in small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Valeska

customer_reviews.title: It does the job effortlessly.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean...best to clean right after you finish juicing. I wash the parts in soapy water and use the brush on the blade which works really well. So far I have only juiced celery and I use it 3 or 4 times a week. I put a plastic bag in the container that holds the pulp which makes for easier clean up.
customer_reviews.author: JST

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Would Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The most important things to consider when buying a juicer: 1. Easy to use 2. Easy to assemble 3. Easy to clean This product delivers and cuts fruits and vegetables of different thickness and density with ease. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is made a lot like the Breville. It is easy to use and clean. What I really like is the16 oz cup. Its perfect for making enough for just one. The foot print is very small ... no large pitcher to figure out where to put when not using it! I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn C

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Though this product is easy to use, easy to clean & assemble IT IS EXTREMELY MESSY! IT IS TERRIBLE AT SORTING PULP FROM JUICE and I am extremely disappointed. As I have grown with juicing this machine simply doesn't fit the quota, as a beginner it surely did suffice because I knew nothing. Definitely needs to upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much work
customer_reviews.text: This machine works as stated by the manufacturer but the problem is that it is too much work for very little juice. It is big, with many parts, not so easy to clean. Worst of all (and this may not be the manufacturer's fault), in order to produce a couple of juice glasses, you need to produce a lot of vegetable/fruit waste. Only if you are really into natural food.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Be healthy
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this juice extractor, my family and I are drinking excellent mixes of natural fruits. Buying the Cuisinart juice extractor is priceless because creating good eating habits at home is important if people want a healthy family. This product has a high quality and it's easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo O.

customer_reviews.title: No other juicer needed
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is awesome, compact and streamlined as can be for a juicer. Pretty easy to clean,assemble use without ready directions.
customer_reviews.author: S Greenough

customer_reviews.title: but works perfect, juices everything extremely effective
customer_reviews.text: Too many parts to clean, but works perfect, juices everything extremely effective, even nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Binca

customer_reviews.title: EASY AND QUIET!!
customer_reviews.text: EASY!!! The size of it, is so perfect! I’m so glad I purchased this one, used it for the first time last night and it was very quiet compare to others, super easy to clean and put together. You seriously can’t go wrong with this, beyond satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: jicel

customer_reviews.title: Skip this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Takes 3 hands to use this juicer. One to add the fruits, one to use the plunger, and a third to hold it still. It moves around so much, it will dislarge the cup. Then it is almost impossible to take apart to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Hart

customer_reviews.title: One of the nicer ones.
customer_reviews.text: I've a number of juicers, but this one was the easiest to clean, quietest, and it makes great juice. When the juicing is done the pulp (I guess you call it) is nice and dry making it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: M3k

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and his family and he loves it! As always, Cuisinart has proven to be an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Doran

customer_reviews.title: The pulp could be larger.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like you have the pulp gets clogged in the opening to pulp container.
customer_reviews.author: James archer

customer_reviews.title: SO easy to clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had juicers before but never this easy to clean. I’m sold on that feature for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene C

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart... You did good on this build.
customer_reviews.text: This product stands up to the Cuisinart standard. Well made, does an awesome job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer for the moneyM
customer_reviews.text: Has great power for juicing vegetables. The only item I find is a little difficult to pulverized through are citrus skins and citrus seeds. Otherwise makes fantastic juices!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like my juicer. It does it's job. The juice tastes great and its easy enough to clean, although a little time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. It is messy. I have yet to master making juice without stuff flying all over my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Works great for an individual, might be a bit small for a couple.
customer_reviews.author: Hobobob12

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Got it much faster than I expected but had apples ready and the juice was awesome! Now to the store to buy for green juice!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It was great juicer! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Juicer is great I love it very easy to clean!,
customer_reviews.author: Rowena

customer_reviews.title: great prduct
customer_reviews.text: love the juicer is very quite and so easy to clean my grand son injoys it also he is 16
customer_reviews.author: Sharon vang

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer. Small compact but has enough power to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer. Small compact but has enough power to take on all vegetables and fruits you can use to make a great healthy juice in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Frankthe3rd

customer_reviews.title: for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: she loves it!!! easy to operate and easy to clean and made her very happy. nice and compact as well.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn / Eva

customer_reviews.title: I did not know it will create so much waste. Anyway I don't think it is particular to ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended. I did not know it will create so much waste. Anyway I don't think it is particular to this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Stop working in two weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Stop working in two weeks of use I had bought two, one for me and the other dor my mom, and stopped working soon.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Victoria Duran Flores

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is exactly what I expected. It sits on my counter and fits under my cabinets. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: JLD

customer_reviews.title: Get juicing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit...easy to use and reasonably quick cleanup. I had a champion a few years back and I prefer the cuisinart... Less parts to clean and it's easier to do so. Price is right too
customer_reviews.author: Spark

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any juice extracted from spinach and kale but a lot of waste.
customer_reviews.text: This juicer seems as underpowered as the one I bought at Big Lots for $25. I juiced kale and spinach and got almost no juice at all but a lot of waste. I will use my blender next time for veggies and only use this one for fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Satyabhama Ashley-Farrand

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart CJE 500 Juicer Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Better than some of the more expensive juicers I have had. Easier to use and better results.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Rubens

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves this. Had to buy a huge tub of grapes, strawberries, blueberries, and blackberries so she could make juice. She's into making smoothies, and wanted to venture into the juicing world. She's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Fuel683

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to clean, compact, and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: CWin99

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. Easy to use, easy to clean and powerful. It doesn't take up too much counter space and it gets the job done. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Friend of Shaman

customer_reviews.title: Very messy and difficult to clean. Allows a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Very messy and difficult to clean. Allows a lot of pulp to come threw that makes the juice murky. I only used it one time and I';m sorry I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good Compact Juicer
customer_reviews.text: The Cuisinart CJE-500 Compact Juice Extractor is compact as it states and it's attractive on the counter. It's easy to asssemble, easy to use and easy to clean. In approximately 30 minutes I juice, wash, dry and assemble the juicer. The juicer is loud, not as quiet as others states. I am making fresh delicious juice of different blends; carrot/apple/lemon, etc. When I am making a large amount of juice, I use a large container instead of the small juice pitcher that comes with the unit. The small juice pitcher fills up quickly. I recommend this juice extractor.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline V

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean, compact juice maker
customer_reviews.text: The machine works as expected, very efficient, and easy to assemble and easy to clean. However if there is a bigger container for juice, that would be even a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Huong-Thu Ton-Nu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one.. Easy to use and clean. Well designed. My other $400 juicer went to my daughter's house. It was bulky and difficult to use with older hands . Bought one for my husband's office staff for Valentine's Day! Because they deserve the best.
customer_reviews.author: NWJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Easy to use, works well, does what it says it does in an era where so much of what we buy doesn't deliver what it purports to provide
customer_reviews.author: herbert Weingartner

customer_reviews.title: Juice.
customer_reviews.text: Small in size - not in power. Easy to clean. Makes good juice. I've stuck everything you can possibly juice into this thing and it just keeps going :)
customer_reviews.author: RealityMyFriend

customer_reviews.title: Good compact juice extractor
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to wash. no issues to use it so far. It helps produce fruit and vegi (carrot and celery) juice daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and very easy to clean. My girlfriend loves it and so does my daughter. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Naw

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this juicer. It is just my husband and me. It juices 16 ounces. I wish you could put oranges and lemons in whole. They recommend you cut the peel off. This is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hip  Hip Puree!
customer_reviews.text: Great product works well and the juicer's price tag is very reasonable Highly Recommend Easy to Clean Would have liked a bigger pitcher
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: First juicer probably only one I'll need.
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing not complaints here. Started to get into juicing veggies and it has performed excellent. Recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Morales

customer_reviews.title: Chunky
customer_reviews.text: Worked the first few times and now everything is chunky with pieces of the fruits and vegetables ending up in the juice. Very unhappy with chunky juice. Also not happy that I have to purchase another juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Yates

customer_reviews.title: A Great Juicer at a reasonal price
customer_reviews.text: Lover this juicer. Tried it in Canada while on holiday. Just had to have one. This is fine for one or two persons in household, but would advice larger size for a household with more people
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Arp-Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I am new to this type of product but the pulp was extremely juicy still and there were small chunks of fruit that were still intact. Also I ended up having plastic in my drink because the mesh basket rubbed the surrounding plastic the wrong way. I wish I had bought the Breville instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Roman

customer_reviews.title: Clean after each 16 oz serving.
customer_reviews.text: It's compact, making it a great counter space saver. On the negative, it is not for the serious juicers. I have to clean after each 16 ounces of juice, if I don't I get puree instead of juice. The pulp or wast e tends to stay in the upper chamber and. clogged up the strainer if not cleaned
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: I'm Juiced!
customer_reviews.text: The juicer is very good! For what I paid I couldn't ask for anything more! I got a great deal of 40% off! If you're just juicing for yourself. This one is perfect! But if your juicing for a lot of people you might want a bigger one.

customer_reviews.title: Works great - and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone who loves fresh juice. Works great - and quickly. Not too bad to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: love this juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Have been juicing for years...needed something compact and easy to clean. This is perfect! Plenty powerful, use it every morning. Designed so that all areas inside juicer can be reached and easily cleaned so no residue buildup inside. Have been using it since Christmas and am very pleased! Recommend highly. Good design.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mama

customer_reviews.title: No greens here
customer_reviews.text: Love the juicer but find it likes dark green leafy veggies as much as a toddler. Disappointed in the waste.
customer_reviews.author: hippysmrf8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this one for two weeks and I love how easy it is to clean. It only takes 5 minutes to dismantle clean, and put back together. It's not the most powerful juicer... but it gets the job done. I have already reccommended this one to serveral friends. Its a great "starter" product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for some foods but not for leafy greens
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while now and it seems to do a much better job juicing carrots, apples, pears, celery - anything "hard" like that. Which spinach, kale or chard, it leaves behind too much of the leaf and doesn't give much juice. I'll keep it to use for some types of juices but I will need to look into a more powerful unit to get the range of juicing I want.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Bee

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable product
customer_reviews.text: It works but quality of product is not that good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The unit was a refurbished unit and it died outside of the 30 day return policy.
customer_reviews.author: WN2

customer_reviews.title: save our money for something else
customer_reviews.text: works poorly,hard to take apart( i have to use pliers to remove grating surface) pulp super wet........... i would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna Ziubinska

customer_reviews.title: I like it, just a little bit hard to wash ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, just a little bit hard to wash it. And I will prefer it to blend a little bit more the fruits, some times the garbage have juice
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Giraldo

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Received it quickly. Easy to assemble, easy to clean, doesn't take up much counter space, easy to use....I love this juicer!
customer_reviews.author: RanDarr

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: The motor stops every 5-10 seconds if it is tasked at all. The motor isn't strong enough to juice oranges, lemons, celery or much else. Probably good for a peach that is chopped very finely, but that is about it.
customer_reviews.author: CLifford J. Latham

customer_reviews.title: it was damage before I even use it for 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this! I ordered when I was out of town and intend to use it when I get home.(10 days later) I use for the first 10 days, I noticed the the filter housing being grind from the mesh filter/blade. I did check carefully for the next few days, but I could not figure it out. I call around and check with my friends but the juicer it already damage so I decided to stop using it! I want to return right away, but then busy with my job and forgot to return before the expiration date, So I actually use it only for 15 days!
customer_reviews.author: tina mcvicar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift so it would be hard for me to write a review
customer_reviews.author: wdavis

customer_reviews.title: I HATE IT
customer_reviews.text: I hated it the chopper screen came out on the jucing prosses and it got all plastic shavings all over the jucer to bad i thrugh the box out or i would send ot back I HATE IT WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: giuseppina nelligan

customer_reviews.title: opened the box after unpacking and was broken in 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: opened the box after unpacking and was broken in 5 pieces, not the manufacturers fault but ignorant lazy factory worker who hates hos job and complete lack of pride!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware.. Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Its a cheap product, I am not very keen into juices and bought this juicer last year for occasionally juicing. I would have hardly used it for 10-15 times, and I observed some black plastic particle in my juice once, while cleaning I found corner of rotor surrounding were actually wiping away and was getting into my juice. Don't know how much of plastic I have consumed already. Worst part is that I observed when my return time window was over.
customer_reviews.author: Lokesh

customer_reviews.title: Kind of messy with little capacity...
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this juicer. The only thing is you have to remember to slide the open and close lever in between juicing. Also it splatters and you can loose control of the fruit or veggie your juicing with or without using the piece used to press down on them. I also didn’t realize how much scraps would be left over. I had to empty it a couple of times. I ended up with a small cut on my hand from cleaning the blade, that was challenging, but I was very pleased with the juice. I’m wondering if I should have spent the extra money on a different one with more capacity. I don’t know. I think it’s great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mack

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I would expect from Cuisinart! i read a lot of reviews for juicers and did not want to spend a lot money on a machine. Because I have had a Cuisinart multi-shredding machine for over 25 years and it works just like the day I purchased it, I went with this juicer. I am able to throw in my vegetables and fruits and instant juice! Very quick cleanup with a brush and rinse. Wipe it off and it is ready for the next use! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: David Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was my first juicer and it is absolutely wonderfuL. It works great ! In one day I have juiced two pineapples 5 1/2 cucumbers beets and carrots spinach kale ginger and the machine handled it perfectly perfectly . I would definitely recommend this to anyone who needs a juicer and is on a budget . Even more so I would recommend it to the first time juicer user.m😍😍
customer_reviews.author: parroyo314

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.text: This juicier is amazing! I've had it for at least a year and it has always been faithful with whatever I juice with it i.e. sweet potatoes, tomatoes, celery, cucumber, carrots, etc. The cleanup is so much easier than a lot of juiciers that I have owned in the past, so if you're looking for one that's easy to clean this it it! Very happy with the amount I spent on it as it's really a quality machine, and I would buy it again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Megan Nikki Prav

customer_reviews.title: Want the best - buy the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished creating my first drink not more than l/2 hour after the Cuisinart was delivered, and what a pleasant surprise. I totally loved the recipe mix of grapefruit and orange and can't wait to get started tomorrow. I was totally unprepared for the great taste, ease of juicing, and the quality of this particular machine. Did my research before ordering, but was still surprised when it all came together so easily. I would highly recommend the Cuisinart to any serious or beginner juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy2

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift . Recipient couldn't wait and decided to give it a try prior to, only to experience great dissatisfaction as it didn't start at all. Item came in manufacturer's box only. It's possible that the box was dropped as it showed some damage. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use it for carrot juice and I made some apple juice one day too. I love that it extracts so much juice producing little waste... my previous other brand juicer wasted so much! Also it is easy to wash, sturdy,good quality and looks great on my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: G. NunezTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Well made, compact juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is one of the less inexpensive models that I researched but does the job well. I have other Cuisinart products so anticipated it would be well made (and it is) and reliable. Instructions are easy to follow. Cleaning can be a bother but then I understand that most juicers are since there needs to be a place to insert the fruit or vegetables, then a place for the extracted juice and the skins or peels, etc. A handy brush for cleaning is provided and I did find it helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Diana R.

customer_reviews.title: I love my juice extractor
customer_reviews.text: I love my juice extractor! It's simple enough to clean. Small enough so it's not taking a lot of space. Makes juice for two of us with plenty of space to make multiple batches without having to clear it out. The reason I did not give it 5 stars is because if you drop any one of these pieces, they completely break. It does surprise me how brittle it is being plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: it's good! but you have to be careful not to ...
customer_reviews.text: it's good! but you have to be careful not to drop the parts, its plastic and it can be easily be broken on the hard kitchen floor. The juicer works nicely, doesn't look cheap and pretty compact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would perform better than my old one and it's sort of like ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would perform better than my old one and it's sort of like I swapped out my old beat up one for a slightly cleaner beat up one. Wastes a LOT of juice and already has a short in it. Sad face.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: If you juice every day, do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: My diet consists of a vegetable juice every day, machine went afte only 7 months of usage of 3 minutes a day
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price, just a little extra and would be great...
customer_reviews.text: Well, overall I am pretty satisfied with my purchase. It is quiet, easy to operate and assemble, and doesn’t take much counter top space. I use it regularly. On the other hand, my unit needs me to hold the on button to operate which annoys me. Also, I find it wastes a lot of fruit/ veggies
customer_reviews.author: E. Villalba

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have used the unit only to juice apples. The instructions state to halve the apples but it took quartering them to get them through the juicer. It is rather a mess to juice the apples as there is a great buildup of skins et. al. within the unit and it takes a little manpower to clean it out.
customer_reviews.author: Rojo Grande

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price its great! It isn't perfect....gives you some of the pulp...but we are making great juices....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: So far I have loved this juicer. Works great for the price. My only complaint is the pulp from the veggies gets stuck on the clear lid instead of all falling into the compartment to catch it, but I have not had any problems from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this juicer and I am hooked. I absolutely love how easy it is to use and how easy it is to clean. I will be using it on a daily basis. I shopped around and did some research and for the money, this was a excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've had no real issues with this as yet. I've used it to juice about 7 times so far. I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Tawana

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Juice Extractor
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect size for our motor home. We have already used it and it is just great. Is small enough to fit on counter, and will also store nicely. There is just two of us so it works nice. Fast and efficient. Cleans up easily. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dorthy I Chubb

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because one of the parts was broken, so I cannot rate it....
customer_reviews.author: C.Has

customer_reviews.title: Love it. This is my first juicer and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is my first juicer and it's so easy to use. Easy quick clean up. Definitely a win!
customer_reviews.author: Denise from Mass

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok juicer, little bit of a mess in the pulp container area when using but I manage ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Problem with auto switch
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer, very compact fits underneath counter with out a problem. Powerful little machine, easy to clean. The only problem so far is that the auto bar/switch cuts out when juicing. You have to hold the safety bar down for juicer to operate.
customer_reviews.author: ptgoodallsr

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart CJE 500 juicer
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the juicer it performed spectacularly. After 3 weeks of juicing once a day, I find that the pulp jams up in the spinner and doesn't drop into the pulp receptacle. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: cindylou

customer_reviews.title: Low plastic quality
customer_reviews.text: the stuck that pushes the food down broke in a trip overseas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I waited and purchase this juicer for myself
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this juicer for my mom and I wish I had one. This was a good purchase. If you're considering buying a cheaper juicer, please don't buy a cheap juicer because, they waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: JB341

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean and small enough to sit on counter without being a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: T Hartis

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a compact juicer for me to begin with and it is just that! Very simple and easy to clean, compact too! Very powerful, never had an trouble any trouble with juicing something.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: This has been great for easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginning juicer. This has been great for easy clean up, storage on the cabinet, and extracting the juice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first juicer! It's very easy to use and very easy to clean (which is always great). I highly recommend this product, cuisinart always had great quality products!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea weeast

customer_reviews.title: good for the money

customer_reviews.title: Compact juice extractor
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power, very strong product. A bit small container only fits one glass of juice. Beautiful product, not noisy at all!
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful juicer!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is excellent for the price! I would definitely recommend this juicer. Although all juicers are a pain to clean, this juicer is very easy to clean. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Theis

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I love Cuisinart for their products and reliability. Adding more juice to you diet is going to pay more than this price!
customer_reviews.author: Shenzi

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CJE-500 Compact Juice Extractor
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

THE CUISINART COMPACT JUICE EXTRACTOR
EAT HEALTHIER, LIVE BETTER 
Extracted juice captures about 95% of the nutrients from fresh fruits and vegetables. Drinking extracted juice is the fastest and most efficient way for your body to digest and absorb all of those nutrients. Digesting whole fruits can take about an hour; extracted juices take only 15 minutes. Now you can create these tasty, nutritious juices, smoothies and more right at home with the Cuisinart Compact Juice Extractor. 

POWERFUL, EASY, QUIET OPERATION
Juice your fruits and vegetables at the touch of a button with the Cuisinart Compact Juice Extractor. The CJE-500 is designed for continuous juicing so you can juice everything from soft foods and leafy greens to denser fruits and veggies. When full, the pulp container can be removed, emptied and replaced to continue juicing. You can juice directly into your own 8-ounce glass or into the 16-ounce juice pitcher to share. Get mess-free juicing as well with the manually controlled adjustable flow spout. Create all your favorites or find new ones with the included recipe booklet. 

CLEAN & EASY
The pulp container, juice pitcher, cover and filter basket/blade assembly are all removable and dishwasher-safe, making cleanup easy. A cleaning brush is also included to remove excess pulp from the filter basket/blade assembly and the lid. With its compact size, it will suit any kitchen. Create your own juice bar at home with the Cuisinart Compact Juice Extractor. 

FEATURES
One-Touch Operation An on/off push button with blue LED makes the juicer easy to use. 

Mesh Filter Basket & Blade Assembly Easily separates pulp and grinds to extract the maximum amount of juice. 

Food Pusher Fits securely into the feed tube to guide fruits and vegetables properly while juicing. 

Cover with Large Feed Tube Minimizes the time spent pre-cutting ingredients. 

Safety Bar Must be up and locked over the cover for the juicer to operate. 

Pulp Container Collects up to 40 ounces and is removable for easy cleaning. 

Adjustable Flow Spout Controlled manually and prevents dripping. 

Juice Pitcher Holds up to 16 ounces of juice and can be replaced for uninterrupted juicing.
feature_bullets: Juice Pitcher holds up to 16 ounces of juice, and can be replaced for uninterrupted juicing
Pulp container collects up to 40 ounces and is removable for easy cleaning
Food Pusher fits securely into feed tube to guide fruits and vegetables properly while juicing
Adjustable flow spout is manually controlled and prevents dripping
Mesh filter basket and blade assembly grinds fruits and vegetables to extract maximum amount of juice; easily separates pulp
